verbose_text: In autophagy process, both of the conversion of LC3-I to LC3-II and the LC3-II degradation events can be seen sequentially [XREF_BIBR], after 12 h, the degradation of LC3-II may be more than production; therefore, the expression of LC3-II at 24 h is less than that at 12 h. p62 was identified as one of the specific substrates that are degraded through the autophagy-lysosomal pathway [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR].
